review: OK, folks, let me save you some exasperation on this little device. You CANNOT adjust the specific RATINGS of the video content allowed on the Amazon Fire TV Stick. I just spent a good hour on the phone with three different Tech Reps from Amazon discussing this and was finally informed that it is an all-or-none selection. You either restrict ALL programs (even "G" rated) and the user has to enter a pin number to unlock ALL programs or you turn off the parental control entirely and ALL programs are watchable. Not a very logical choice as I would like to set the program ratings (like allow "G" but not "PG" or greater) but no deal, it's not possible. Good Grief Charlie Brown, who thought this up? The device is a perfect size for a remote kids room, except for the little bitty tiny issue noted above....! Don't buy it if you have the thought of using it in a room where you are not constantly present to monitor what is being watched.
author: G. Shaw
